column5: Hey guys, I was in Port hope Saturday night and I dropped my phone right where the parking is for the yacht club. The phone is a black Motorola Razor. If anyone here lives down that way or if your heading down that way and you spot it can you please let me know. Thanks guys, any info would be appreciated.  -Fishnpro
Call it!  See if someone picks up?
You can make a lovely hat out of previously-used aluminum foil.
how was the fishing?  seriously, best bet is to go back to the spot and call it using a friend's phone before the battery drains

I dropped my wallet between the rocks their going out to the pier last week, all my I.D. just took out $200 and also had $40 U.S. in their.  So if anyone hears of a wallet let me know.  Really sucks trying to  replace everything.  Good Luck on The Phone at least you hopefully dropped yours on dry land.
